name: Disables unnecessary functionality
author: DreamerKlim

sections.description:
Disable unnecessary functions:

  • REST API
  • Emoji
  • links to blog clients
  • links to RSS feeds
  • version of your WordPress
  • automatic links in comments
  • srcset and sizes for pictures

What you will get after activation:

  • Improved SEO
  • A little bit of speed
  • Сlean source code
sections.installation:
1. Upload the “Delete trash” folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the “Delete trash” folder to the /wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

The plugin can break my site?

Yes, this can happen but the probability is very small. If this happens, disable the plugin.

How to check whether the plugin?

Just compare the source code of the website to the plugin and after.

I have a lot of plugins and they sometimes hinder my blog, but as this plugin affect website speed?

Only positively.

short_description: Just disables unnecessary functionality of WordPress, thus improving and speeding up your site ^_^
